columns.description: The number of grid columns in the design.

gap.description: The width of the gap between each column.

edge.description: The minimum width of the flexible space between the content and the edge of the page.

max.description: The max-width of the site, including [`edge`](#edge) spacing; the point at which the site transitions from fluid width to static width. Setting a `max` value ensures the column and margin widths are correct once the site width is static.

base.description: The units – either `vw` or `%` – used in the fluid base for calculations. This value is always appended to `100`.

reduce.description: Set `reduce` to `true` to reduce the `calc()` output using postcss-calc.

debug.description: Set `debug` to `true` print the pre-processed CSS declaration as a warning.
